mapper.select: select * from reply r, deal d, member m where r.member_num = m.member_num and r.board_num = d.board_num and d.board_num = #{board_num} order by reply_ref desc, reply_step
mapper.update: update reply set reply_step = reply_step +1where reply_ref=#{reply_ref} and reply_step > #{reply_step}
update reply set reply_content=#{reply_content} where reply_num=#{reply_num}
